tracks.name: Web Dev
tracks.description: Build and ship working full stack tools using modern web technologies like React, Express, and Supabase.

modules.title: Fast Recap
modules.project: Ship a public portfolio or landing page
modules.description: Recap HTML, CSS, and JS basics. Learn to structure content and styles to build and deploy a professional static website that introduces you or an idea.

modules.title: React & Interactive UI
modules.description: Master React components, props, and state. Solve a problem by building a dynamic, single-page tool like a custom dashboard, timer, or note app.

modules.title: Express.js & APIs
modules.project: Design and build a REST API
modules.description: Understand the backend. Use Express.js to create routes and middleware, building an API that returns useful data for any frontend application.

modules.title: Databases & Authentication
modules.project: Create a full stack CRUD app
modules.description: Manage data and users. Integrate Supabase to add a database and user authentication, building an app that can create, read, update, and delete data.

modules.title: Full Stack Integration
modules.description: Connect the frontend and backend to build a polished, fully-functional web application. Focus on a great user experience and deploy it publicly.

modules.title: Final Project Launch
modules.description: Work in a team to build a complete product that solves a real problem. Prepare for a public launch on platforms like Product Hunt or DevPost.

tracks.name: Fundamentals
tracks.description: Ship open source tools, CLI apps, bots, and backend services that developers and users will love.

modules.title: Scripting & CLI Tools
modules.description: Go beyond basic scripts. Build a useful command-line tool that solves a problem for you or other developers, like a file organizer or code generator.

modules.title: APIs & HTTP Requests
modules.description: Connect your code to the world. Use an external API to build a bot for a platform like Discord or a script that automates a repetitive task.

modules.title: Web Scraping & File Ops
modules.description: Extract valuable information from the web. Write a robust script that scrapes a website, collects the data, and organizes it into a useful format like CSV or JSON.

modules.title: Backend Services with Flask/FastAPI
modules.project: Create a microservice or personal API
modules.description: Build lightweight backends. Use a Python framework to create your own API that can power a website, serve data, or run a specific task.

modules.title: Packaging & Open Source
modules.project: Publish a developer tool or library
modules.description: Contribute to the community. Package one of your tools for easy distribution and publish it as an open-source project on GitHub with a high-quality README.

modules.title: Final Project Launch
modules.project: Ship a useful tool with a public repo
modules.description: Create a high-impact developer tool or automation. Focus on usefulness, code quality, and clear documentation for a public GitHub launch.

tracks.name: Data Science
tracks.description: Go beyond the numbers. Analyze real-world data, uncover meaningful insights, and tell compelling stories with visualizations.

modules.title: Jupyter & Basic EDA
modules.description: Learn the tools of the trade. Use Python and Jupyter Notebooks to conduct a basic exploratory data analysis (EDA) on a provided dataset to find initial patterns.

modules.title: Pandas & NumPy
modules.description: Master data manipulation. Use pandas and numpy to clean, transform, and analyze a real dataset, then present your findings in a public notebook.

modules.title: Data Visualization
modules.description: Tell a story with data. Use libraries like Matplotlib or Plotly to create compelling charts and graphs that make a complex topic easy to understand.

modules.title: Real-World Datasets
modules.project: Produce a cleaned dataset & insight report
modules.description: Tackle messy data. Source a dataset from Kaggle or an API, perform a rigorous cleaning process, and publish both the clean data and an insights report.

modules.title: Streamlit & Dashboards
modules.description: Bring your analysis to life. Use Streamlit to turn your data notebook into an interactive web app or dashboard that users can explore.

modules.title: Final Project Launch
modules.project: Publish a final Kaggle notebook or Streamlit app
modules.description: Solve a real problem with data. Conduct a comprehensive analysis to uncover a meaningful insight and publish your work for the community to see and use.
